name: TP Shopper
description:
TP Shopper

This is a prototype of a 'shopping battle' game.

Grab a roll of toilet paper, and carry it to the green square on the floor.

I don't know what potential this has to be worked into a complete game, yet.  If there does prove to be interest,  features to add would include:

  • NPCs and _better_ AI (customers, and employees)
  • A 'shove' ability to cause customers to drop what they are carrying
  • A better scoring system
  • More levels, random level generation
  • Goals/Achievements other than just collecting TP
  • Lots of polish (and bug fixes, I'm sure!)
  • ...
  • Profit?
Controls: 
  • 'WASD' keys to move
  • 'E' to pick up items
  • Left mouse button to 'throw' an item you are carrying
Update 2023-03-22 (v0.0.2) 
  • Added NPC movement (they are not 'intelligent', yet)
  • Levels automatically restart after 'Out of Stock'
